hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Ayyub Al-Ansari said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'When any one of you goes to defecate, let him not face toward the Qiblah, rather let him face towards the east or the west

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَمْرِ بِاسْتِقْبَالِ الْمَشْرِقِ أَوِ الْمَغْرِبِ عِنْدَ الْحَاجَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Command To Face Toward The East Or The West When Relieving Oneself
